description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。高等大地工程(二)主要課程單元包括：(1)岩石材料與岩體的工程意義、(2)岩石應力與應變的關係與工程意義、(3) 岩石變形性與強度的工程意義(4)如何辨識不穩定邊坡(5)如何辨識不穩定隧道(6)岩石工程設計理念(7)案例研究等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [II] consist of (1) Rock Material and Rock Mass (2)Stress and Stength (3)Deformability and Stength (4)Identify Unstable Rock Slope  (5)Identify Unstable Rock Tunnel (6)Rock Engineering Design (7) Engineering Case Studies.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and appro92hes, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

name.en: Special Topics on Inter92tive Media Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of inter92tion design, inter92tive media and inter92tive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design pr92tice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of inter92tive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of inter92tive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a inter92tive media design project.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: 新聘老師(1月中左右確認師長) 曾垂紀1.5

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在探討電子商務與行動商務的技術、管理與應用，課程內容包含企業e化概論、電子商務概論、B2C商務、B2B商務、電子付款、無線通訊技術、行動裝置應用、行動計算、行動商務、無所不在的運算、資訊安全等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and applications of electronic commerce and mobile commerce. The topics include e-business overview, e-commerce overview, B2C commerce, B2B commerce, e-payments, wireless technology, mobile access, mobile computing, mobile commerce, pervasive computing, security, and so forth.

description.zh: 資訊科技日新月益。現今資訊科技系統已成為企業中的重要部份。本課程的主要目標在廣泛的介紹使用更新進的資訊科技所產生資訊系統的進步。本課程的組成包括以下四類的介紹：一、資訊科技系統的介紹；二、結合RFID應用的資訊系統；三、結合行動裝置的資訊系統；四、雲端應用的資訊系統。
description.en: The information technology advances rapidly. Now, the information technology system has become an essential part of enterprises. The goal of the course is breadth to cover advances in information systems, with emphasis on enabling technologies. The content of this course is composed of the following four parts. In Part 1, the information technology systems are explained. Part 2 covers the information systems with RFID applications. Part 3 covers the information systems with mobile devices. Finally, Part 4 covers cloud information systems.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: 一下必修(三選二課程)曾垂紀老師1.5

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。本課程將由基本現場管理(Shop Floor Control)需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹BI與企業資源規劃、BI與電子商務、BI與顧客關係管理等議題上。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，EMBA班學生可以討論其熟悉產業之KPI，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: Business intelligence (BI) is a business management term which refers to applications and technologies which are used to gather, provide access to, and analyze data and information about their company operations. Business intelligence systems can help companies have a more comprehensive knowledge of the factors affecting their business, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and they can help companies to make better business decisions. In this course, shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques, such as RFID, will be introduced firstly. Database and data warehouse concepts will also be mentioned. Applications of BI in ERP, EC and CRM will be the important focus of this course. Students will have a chance to implement BI software based on his business-related data in this course.

name.zh: 產業政策與企業優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Industry Policy and Business Betterment

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，政府需訂定各項政策來因應潮流之變化並輔導產業更具競爭力。本課程將使EMBA學生了解政府相關產業政策，並透過一些成功案例探討製造業服務化、服務業科技化與國際化及傳統產業特色化等相關技術及對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, government often tries to assist industries to boost their competitiveness with various public policies. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest industrial policy plans and potential benefits on encompassing the creation of a service-oriented manufacturing industry, an internationalized and high-tech services industry and a specialty-oriented traditional industry. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

name.en: Managing a Lean and Mean Business

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程進一步針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，從組織、人員、技術、流程與哲理，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品企畫、設計開發、試產、量產不同階段以及延伸出的供應鍊之交期、品質、成本精實思維與策略，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合流程需求。本課程包含外聘產業界講師演講。學生將對成功進行精實化管理企業公司所引用質化和量化的作法加以分析探討。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This course further addresses some of the important issues involved with the product or service planning, development, pilot run and implementation of Lean Enterprises. Organization. People, technology, processes and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: 一下必修(三選二之一的課程)

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於將個體經濟學相關理論引用至企業管理決策上。討論主題包括供給與需求理論、市場需求預測、廠商理論、成本利潤分析、市場結構、定價策略與競爭者分析等議題。希望同學修習本課程後，更能瞭解如何利用經濟分析工具，更加精準並有效率地解決實務上所面臨的重要經營管理議題。
description.en: The course covers microeconomic concepts relevant to managerial decision-making. Topics include demand and supply analysis, consumer demand forecasting, production and cost analysis, market structure, pricing policies and competitor analysis. This course will help students to have a better understanding of the economic tools and their potential use for solving real-world problems.

name.zh: 顧客行為與互動行銷決策

description.zh: 顧客會購買某項產品，絕大部分的因素不是產品本身，而是「產品被賦予的意義」讓顧客認同。這表示，「與顧客的互動」，是交易進行的基本元素。電子商務的興起，讓互動行銷的重要性大增，透過網路，企業有了一個和顧客直接對話的空間。 這帶來的是機會，也是挑戰。本課程在互動行銷方面，強調以顧客行為為出發點，用溝通觀點及體驗行銷觀點發展互動行銷策略，課程將以哈佛個案教學方式為主。
description.en: Customer buying behavior on the interactive media is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, customer buying behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship. Harvard Business School case method will be used.

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以品牌理論來探討品牌行銷策略的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含品牌特性、品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、品牌策略。身為公司品牌經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The nature of brand, brand marketing, brand competition, brand strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.

description.zh: 智慧型代理人系統技術結合人工智慧、分散式計算與網際網路技術，逐漸成為未來重要的資訊技術。本課程介紹智慧型代理人系統之理論、架構與應用。學生透過此課程實做一個智慧型代理人系統，以瞭解代理人技術與應用。課程主要內容包括 - 1.多代理人理論與架構，2. 機器學習與代理人調適，3. 協調技術，4. 合作與競爭，5.賽局理論與決策，6.知識本體論， 7.網路服務。本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: Intelligent agents integrate artificial intelligence, network, distributed computing and web technology. This course introduces the state of  the art of intelligent agents, its theories,  languages, architectures and applications. Students can learn from the course the basic concepts and understanding of agent system through the course. The content includes the intelligent agents about - 1.Fundamental theories and architectures, 2. Machine learning and adaptive agents, 3.Negotiation and coordination, 4 Cooperative and competitive problem solving, 5. Game theories and decision making,  6. Ontology and knowledge sharing, 7.Semantic web and web services.

name.zh: 行動應用軟體開發技術

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉開發行動應用軟體所需之各項整合技術。課程內容包括： 1. 行動應用軟體設計概觀  2. Android SDK 與 Eclipse 開發工具  3. iSO SDK 與 Xcode 開發工具  4. 內建裝置應用設計(I)：Accelerometer、振動、Media Player  5. 內建裝置應用設計 (II)：GPS、Map  6. 網路應用設計(I)：Web Service，JSON  7. 網路應用設計 (II)：AJAX，JavaScript，JQuery  8. 資料庫應用設計：SQLite  9. 社群應用軟體開發  10. App Store 應用軟體行銷  11. 行動應用軟體設計趨勢  12. 期末專題製作
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge and practices to develop mobile applications.  This course covers the technical foundations of the mobile application development skills through readings, lectures, and class projects.  Course topics include: 1. Overview  2. Android SDK and Eclipse Development Tools  3. iSO SDK and Xcode Development Tools  4. Media and Camera Application Design：Video、Audio、and Photo APIs  5. Location and Sensors Application Design：GPS、Map APIs  6. Connectivity Application Design(I)：Web Service，JSON  7. Connectivity Application Design (II)：AJAX，JavaScript，JQuery  8. Database Application Design：SQLite  9. Social Application Design  10. App Store and Applications Marketing  11. Mobile Application Development Trend   12. Final Project

description.en: The course objective is to introduce geometric algorithms. Goals include exposure to algorithms and data structures for geometric problems. This course involves programming assignments. Topics include: curves and surface modeling, differential geometry, b-splines, non-uniform rational b-splines, intersection problems, feature representation, triangulation, Voronoi diagrams, convex hulls, and computational design.

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

name.en: Special Topics of Universal Design in Furniture

description.zh: 全適化設計在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足每一個使用者的需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認全適化設計思維方法與實務，本課程著重於全適化設計理論在家具設計上的應用。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 跨文化溝通, 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved intercultural communication and design project with research and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive research. The study of related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 人機境互動設計專題係使用者、產品、環境彼此之間互動作用為主題，思考其介面設計，產品語言和溝通之脈絡。透過理論、案例、實作，驗證產品創新方法。
description.en: Human-Machine-Environment interaction design is a field in which designers discover and respond to people's spoken and unspoken needs through analyzing physical, cognitive, social, and cultural human factors. These factors reveal human needs and activities in an effort to create products, messages, services, and systems that fit people's lifestyles. Human-centered design employs methods including behavioral observation, prototyping, and systems design.

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉末冶金學"的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。

description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Logistics Systems Decision Analysis and Performance Evaluation

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習各種物流系統決策分析與績效評估的理論與方法，並透過實際演練熟習各種分析與評估方法。主要的方法包括：層級分析法(Analytic Hierarchy Process; AHP)、品質機能展開(Quality Function Deployment; QFD)、績效評估矩陣、(Performance Evaluation Matrix; PEM)、資料包絡分析法(Data Envelop Analysis; DEA)、多目標決策分析與模糊理論等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on learning the theories and methods of decision analysis and performance evaluation for logistics management. Those theories and methods include, but not limited to, analytical hierarchy process (AHP), quality function development (QFD), performance evaluation matrix (PEM), data envelop analysis (DEA), multi-objective decision-making, and fuzzy set theory.

description.zh: 本課程由ERP概論談起，介紹完整的ERP架構及涵蓋的模組，以及企業規劃及導入ERP的過程，最後結合案例介紹、並探討從ERP到企業的e化等主題，期許同學完成本課程後能了解並運用ERP。
description.en: This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.zh: 由於無線通信相較於有線通信，具備有可容納更多頻道，遠距傳輸損耗較低且較不受地物影響之優勢，使得無線通信變成目前世界上發展最為快速之工程技術之一。如無線區域通信網路(WLAN)；無線寬頻通信網路(WCDMA)；移動無線通信(Mobile Com）等。其中微波通信，則為無線通信之實際核心技術，並決定無線通信系統許多參數及性能。其主要部分含有微波輻射場形，收發系統，波形調變架構等。因而本課程之目的在於配合現今及未來工程技術之發展，提供在無線通信系統領域中，重要微波通信工程之基礎概念，可為有興趣於無線通信工程之學生，建立有效且實際之系統工程概念及系統設計之基礎。
description.en: Due to advantages in accommodating larger capacity of individual information channels, less path loss for long didtance link communication has rapidly expanded throughout the world in recent year. Such as WLAN, WCDMA and Mobile communications etc. Therefore, the object of this course is to provide the crucial background knowledge for microwave link concept, architecture and processing. Major parts of this course will be emphasized on the region of system level rather than go into detailed component questions. Thus, it is perhaps more suitable for senior or graduate students.

notes: 電通所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

name.en: Special Topics in Digital Signal Processing

description.zh: 本課程將深入探討一項或數項特定之數位信號處理技術。探討的主題如多取樣率信號處理，頻譜估測，定點運算DSP CPU之介紹，定點運算之正規化及溢位之處理，其他實做之議題，及個案研究等。
description.en: Thorough treatment of special topics in digital signal processing technologies such as multi-rate signal processing,spectral estimation, intro to fixed-opint DSP CPU,normalization and overflow protection, implementation issues, and case studies.

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

description.zh: 本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟, 透過課程專題製作,學者將學習以UML記載分析與設計之結果, 並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之. 課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析, 使用個案, 觀念模型, 有限狀態模型  3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案, 合作圖, 類別圖,  設計模板,  3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對  4. 專題

The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML  2. Object-oriented languages and environments  3. Term project.

The topics include: 1. Introduce system development platform and tool-chains on handheld devices. 2. Developing software using opensource GUI and computer vision libraries. 3. Developing Vision-based techniques for intelligent human-computer interaction on handheld devices . 4. Developing augmented reality applications on handheld devices

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
description.en: Bioelectrochemistry can be investigated to get more and more advanced information about biochemical reaction, morphology, and physical, chemical, and electric properties. The techniques have been used in a variety of ways, for example, as an electrochemical tool to study heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, for high-resolution imaging of the chemical reactivity and topography of various interfaces, and for microfabrication. For bioanalysis, bioelectrochemistry sensors have maximum reliability and can be successfully employed in electroactive biomaterials, matrix materials, and their size. Bioelectroanalysis include descriptions of the most advanced and successful methods, which in large part build on the fundamentals will be described.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 電機控制系統設計與模擬
name.en: Design and Simulation of Electric Machine Control Systems

description.zh: 此課程包含以下主題：(1)直流馬達、伺服馬達、及永磁交流馬達的建模、控制系統設計與模擬，(2)馬達速度及位置觀測器設計與模擬，(3)數位控制及驅動器設計與模擬。
description.en: The contents of this course include: (1) Modeling, control system design, and simulation of DC motor, servo motor and permanent magnet synchronous motor. (2) Motor speed and position estimator design and simulation. (3) Digital control and driver design and simulation.

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介2. 隨機程序3. 數位調變與多工技術4. 最佳接收器5. 載波與符碼同步6. 消息理論7. 訊源編碼8. 通道編碼9. 展頻通訊系統10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義2. 電壓降與停電3. 電壓不平衡4. 電力諧波5. 頻率變動6. 電壓閃爍7. 暫態過壓8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

name.zh: 積體電路實體設計演算法
name.en: Issues Related to Manufacturing and Reliability

description.zh: 介紹VLSI設計流程及技術地圖基本演算法分割平面規劃擺置、繞線(整體繞線、細部繞線)時脈及電線/接地繞線壓縮佈置後最佳化時序建模及最佳化訊號/電源完整性其它和製作及可靠度有關之議題
description.en: Design Flow of VLSI and Technology RoadmapBasic AlgorithmsPartitionFloorplanningPlacement and Routing (Global Routing, Detail Routing)Interconnection of Clock and Power/GroundOptimization for post-processingModeling and Optimization of TimingSignal Integrity

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與Z-轉換2. 取樣原理3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換4. 數位濾波器系統設計5. 同位訊號處理6. 時變訊號處理-短時域傅式轉換7. 離散時間隨機程序8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 欲使工業產品與生產程序更具生態化效率，本課程將專注於講述如何降低生產程序/作業流程對環境的影響。綠色生產即意味著永續、環境化友善設計、綠色工廠、與同步整合性產品與製程設計。本課程將教授RoHS法令、WEEE法令內容、智慧型永續企業工程設計系統、產品生命週期管理、與產品終期分析等課題。
description.en: Making industrial products and production processes more ecologically efficient, this course focuses on how to reduce the environmental impact of production operations. Green production indicates sustainable, environmentally friendly, green factories and products with simultaneously integrated product and process designs. The main topics to be covered include the overview of “Directive of the European Parliament and of the Council on the Restriction of the Use of Certain Hazardous Substances in Electrical and Electronic Equipment” (RoHS) and “Directive of the European Parliament and of the Council on Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment” (WEEE), intelligent sustainable enterprise engineering design that will reduce waste at all levels, and product life cycle management (LCM) and its end-of-life analysis.

description.zh: 本課程介紹網路行銷各種重點技巧，包括社群行銷與、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學對網路創業與網路行銷有一個整體的了解。
description.en: This course will introduce all the internet marketing techniques generally. Let them know what is internet marketing and how it works.

notes: 四工四甲乙與工管碩一合開,碩班限20人

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

name.zh: 影視遊戲配樂製作理論與實務
name.en: Theory and Practice in Scoring for Film, TV, and Video Games

description.zh: 本課程在指導學生透過音樂理論、和聲、句法結構、即興及配器技巧的學習，學會影視、遊戲配樂創作的基本能力，並透過電腦音樂軟體，如序列器、取樣器的使用，學得必要的數位編曲工具、影音整合運用之技術。學完此課程後，學生將有能力運用數位音樂工作站整合多種軟體工具，並運用即興彈奏的方式，完成具有品質的影視、遊戲配樂。
description.en: This course covers the topics of basic music theory, harmony, phrasing, improvisation, instrumentation, orchestration, and the techniques of using music workstations and virtual instruments. Through the study of music theory and the practice in improvisation and music sequencing, students will be able to use improvisation techniques with the assistance of computer music technology to finish their scoring for film, television, and video games.

description.zh: 近年裝置創作手法不侷限在單一媒材與思維，加上科技進步，裝置也融入了數位媒材與傳播媒體，創作者透過每次的創作也是對自我的更新與啟發。也正是這項特質，創作者可以將隱喻元素加以組合，最後呈現出真實而令人驚艷的作品，同時也連結參與者的經驗與生活記憶。本課程就複合媒體裝置以軟體、硬體、空間分別論述，學生分組並透過團體腦力激盪進行發散與收斂思考，用深度和廣度的思維結合多人創意，最終協同完成複合媒體裝置於特定公眾場合展示與作觀察記錄。
description.en: In recent years device creation manners have no longer been restrained in a single media and thought. With the advance of technology, device has fit in digital media and mass media. Hence, artists gain new inspiration every time they create. It is this feature that helps artists to add in metaphor and present a substantial and stunning work. Meanwhile, the work itself connects the participants' life experiences and memories. Software, hardware, and space will be introduced to students in terms of compound media device. Students will be asked to brainstorm in groups in order to exchange thoughts and complete their own compound media device which will be displayed and recorded in public.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

name.en: Special Topics on Engineering Information Management

description.zh: 本課程將以工程資訊管理之觀點，介紹國內外工程資訊管理及營建自動化案例，包含資訊管理程式撰寫及探討資料庫之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解工程資訊管理系統之基本概念與應用，進而實際開發一個資訊管理系統，其內容包括：營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型應用，國內外工程資訊管理案例探討，工程資訊之分析與設計，資訊管理程式撰寫，資料庫系統之設計與實作，及系統分析與設計等方法。
description.en: This course will provide students with the application of engineering information management and the practice of construction management system, management information system concept, the introduction of database design, building information management application, web-based project management system development, integrate construction management information system's introduction, the introduction of construction automation application, the future of engineering information management and other special topics.

name.en: Applications of Computer Software for Engineering

description.zh: 土木工程涵蓋範圍廣泛，本課程主要著重於工程軟體之應用，務使學生熟悉1.結構設計各步驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法.2.教授學生自行準備輸入程式資料,並操件以求取結果.3.根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。
衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

notes: 博士班(和防災所丙丁戊組合開)

description.zh: 1.光的電磁理論回顧2.光學系統光束追跡3.高斯光學4.共振腔理論5. 原子輻射6.雷射振盪與放大7.雷射種類與應用
description.en: 1.Review of Electromagnetic Theory2.Ray Tracing in Optical System3.Gaussian Beams in Optical Media4.Optical Resonator and Cavity Theory5.Atomic Radiation6.Laser Oscillation, Amplification, and Excitation7.Laser Characteristics, Category, and Applications

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 產品分析與產品服務系統
name.en: Product Analysis and Product Service System

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討並演練各種分析工具與手段，藉以解析市場產品的功能、使用性、材料與製造、文化與美感，並解析顧客的需求與渴望。在此基礎下，導入產品服務系統(Product Service System)的理論，以更寬廣的視野探討消費者的需求，並以workshop驗證之。
description.en: Product Analysis is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Through product analysis, designers interpret characteristics of every single product of a specific market and gain a summary of the competition among brands. Lecture on methods of product analysis will be given followed by case studies and practice. Furthermore, the concept and theory of Product Service System (PSS) will be engaged to enhance a broader vision to customers' requirement. A marketable set of products and services is capable of jointly fulfilling a user's needs and having a lower environmental impact than traditional business models. Workshop will be carried out to fulfill this aspiration.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.en: Management and leadership in technological colleges

description.zh: 分析當前技職校院內在、外在教育環境的衝擊，從理論及個案探討層面比較技職校院組織變革、經營模式、領導型態。
description.en: To analyze the changing of internal and external environment that impacts on technological colleges currently, and to discuss and compare ogranizational invovation models, the management and leadership styles among technological colleges from both theoretical and paractical aspects.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉中西方翻譯理論的重要概念與原則，並將理論知識運用於各種文體的英漢與漢英實務翻譯上。學生將對翻譯理論深入探討，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of translation theories, both Chinese and Western. It will also assist students in applying their theoretical knowledge to practical English <-> Chinese translations of various types. Its aim is to help students to discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 由於網際網路與行動運算的快速發展，網路服務正引領潮流，網路服務創業成為目前服務業發展的主流，本課程主要在使學生瞭解網路服務的特性、品質、顧客滿意度以及網際網路服務的創新和創業策略等，期使企業未來能成為卓越網路服務公司。 課程內容包含網路服務產品創新、網路服務經營模式創新、網路服務行銷創新、網路服務組織創新、網路服務新事業創新等，有助於學生將創意和創業事業化。服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Due to the rapid progress of internet and mobile computing, network services become very critical. Starting a business on network services has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. The focus of this course is to let student understand the nature, quality, customer satisfaction, innovation and entrepreneurship of network services. The expectation equips students with the ability to start a company that offers excellent network services.

notes: 資管所與最後一哩合開，限40人

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡: 包括物質本性, 化學熱力學, 化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化: 包括化學反應速率與動力學, 分子反應動力學, 表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

description.zh: 本課程介紹高分子結構與其特性之關係，內容包括分子量、分子組成及結構、溶液特性、相變化、自組裝性質、彈性行為、粘彈性、動態機械性質、光學、電學和光電特性。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the relationship between polymer structure and properties: focusing on the molecular conformation and configuration, solution and phase behavior, rubber elasticity, viscoelasticity, dynamic mechanical behavior, optic, electronic and optoelectronic properties.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

notes: 化工所與生化所合開，生化所為選修

name.zh: 時間序列分析與製程控制
name.en: Time Series Analysis and Process Adjustment

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於教導學生如何利用時間序列分析、品質製程管制、工程製程控制等方法來達成先進製程控制的目的。課程講述之內容包含下列課題:製程監控、製程調整、離散動態製程、時間序列模型、轉換方程模型、最佳回饋控制器、指數加權移動平均控制、遞迴式估計與自適應控制等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students a modern treatment of discrete-time advanced process control (APC) methods based on time series analysis, statistical process control (SPC) and engineering process control (EPC) for Quality Engineering in manufacturing. The topics that will be addressed in this course include:(1)	Process Monitoring; (2)	Process Adjustment;(3)	Discrete-Time Dynamical Processes; (4)	ARIMA Time Series Models; (5)	Transfer Function Modeling; (6)	Optimal Feedback Controllers; (7)	EWMA Control; (8)	Recursive Estimation and Adaptive Control.

description.zh: 1. 智慧型控制系統簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）系統2-1 類神經網路基礎 2-2 類神經網路應用及實習 3. 模糊邏輯控制系統 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用及實習 4. 基因演算法 4-1 基因演算法基礎 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用及實習
description.en: English Description: 1. Introduction of artificial intelligence control system 2. Artificial neural networks (ANN) 2-1 ANN fundamentals 2-2 Applications and experiments of neural-control 3. Fuzzy logic control system  3-1 Fuzzy logic basics 3-2 Applications and experiments of fuzzy control 4. Genetic algorithms 4-1 Preliminary of GA  4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms.

description.zh: 以並行計算架構和分散式系統的開始，探討當代的雲端運算基礎設施，它們是如何部署在亞馬遜、谷歌和蘋果等公司，以及雲端運算應用的領域，如醫療保健、銀行和科學。也探討如何成功地使用虛擬化、資源管理和適量的網絡支持，包括內容分發網絡和存儲區域網絡，以在企業用戶部署雲端運算的應用
description.en: Beginning with a discussion of parallel computing and architectures and distributed systems, the course turns to contemporary cloud infrastructures, how they are being deployed at leading companies such as Amazon, Google and Apple, and how they can be applied in fields such as healthcare, banking and science. The course also examines how to successfully deploy a cloud application across the enterprise using virtualization, resource management and the right amount of networking support, including content delivery networks and storage area networks.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對物化處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括化學反應動力學、高等氧化還原程序、薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序等之應用。
description.en: This course will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of Physicochemical treatment process rather than operations, thus encompassing quality transformation in natural waters, water supply, and municipal and industrial wastewaters.

description.zh: 風險評估、風險管理及風險政策等工具已成為現代社會管理人類活動和產品造成的環境及健康問題。本課程的目的為培育跨領域了解環境風險及利用自然科學及社會科學的觀點和方法進行管理。同時包含探討環境風險評估管理所用的方法、相關理論和假設，並了解其作用。
description.en: Risk, assessment, risk management and risk governance have become key concepts in modern society's attempts to manage environmental and health problems connected with human activities and products. The object of this course is to train an integrated interdisciplinary understanding of environmental risks and their management by perspectives and approaches from natural and social sciences. This course also critically examines the role of risk assessment in environmental management by checking the methods used, as well as the underlying theories and assumptions.

name.en: Green House Gas Management and Practice

description.zh: 氣候變遷儼然已為全球邁入21世紀所面對最嚴峻國際環保課題，對非聯合國氣候變化綱要公約締約國及屬於外銷型新興工業國家的台灣，正處在發展轉捩點上，為維持國家競爭力，國內應擬訂更積極之節能減碳政策，並著手研擬調適衝擊方案，同時加強與國際間合作，進行減碳政策、技術與經驗交流，以推動碳市場之國際接軌，並確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展。本課程將介紹溫室氣體與氣候變遷之關連性、國際溫室氣體管制相關公約、我國溫室氣體管理現況、溫室氣體減量政策與經濟工具、及溫室氣體衝擊調適與節能新技術等，期藉由本課程使之瞭解全球暖化成因與後果與國內外溫室氣體管理現況與法規要求，以提升我國於氣候變遷因應之認知。
description.en: This class introduces scientific, economic, and ecological issues about the threat of global climate change, and the Policy Instruments of greenhouse gas management.  This course examines the interconnections of international politics and climate change.  It includes Green House Gas inventory, carbon tax and emission trading, Voluntary approach and other greenhouse gas management policy tools.  It explores an integrated approach to analysis the benefits of greenhouse gas and air pollution reduction measures, and related model development.

description.zh: 由於台灣地小人稠,為了更有效利用土地,達到更高之生產量,使得土壤污染問題特別顯得重要,因此整治土壤污染是刻不容緩.本課程對於土壤污染之整治由萃取,氣提,固定安定化,淋洗,電熔等物化方法傳授之,其次講授生物復育技術,最後以工程經濟角度,進行本益比分析。.
description.en: There are many remediate methods in this class.The methods include solvent extraction,air stripping,solidification/stabilization,solid flushing,and thermel treatment.This f topicalso includes bioremediation and cost effective analysis.

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

notes: 新聘(劉建中)1時數,請進修部安排億光大樓教室

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.簡介  2.隨機向量之性質  3.假設測試  4.參數分類  5.參數估計 6.非參數密度估計  7.非參數分類和錯誤估計  8.連續參數估計9.特徵抽取線性對應信號表示  10. 特徵抽取線性對應分類11.分群法  12.應用
description.en: 1. Introduction  2.Random vectors and their properties  3.Hypothesis testing   4. Parametric Classifiers  5.Parameter estimation  6.Nonparametric density estimation  7.Nonparametric Classification and error estimation  8.Successive parameter estimation  9.Feature extraction and linear mapping for signal representation  10.Feature extraction and linear mapping for classification 11.Clustering  12.Applications

description.zh: 工業機器人概論，基礎理論分析：運動學，動力學，控制等，機器人之設計程序，機器人在彈性裝配與製造系統之應用分析與系統設計，智慧型機器人，個案研究等 。
description.en: Introduction to industrial robot, Fundamental theory of robot: kinematics, dynamics, and control etc., Robot design process, Application to flexible assembly and manufacturing system, Introduction to intelligent robot, Case study, etc.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討物業管理理論以及實際的操作手法。並結合現有的物業管理案例說明其實例運作方式在台灣的課題與機會。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the propertymanagement, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and  Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces.5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在於讓研究所學生就建築構造與施工學們有進階性之認識、探討與操作。故包含講義授課、校外專家專業分享(結合雙師計畫)、實務課題分組操作等進行方式。廣義之建築構造應包含:建築材料應用、建築構法原理、設計與介面整合、建築生產與管理等面向，故本課程以上述關鍵詞進行為期十八周的訓練。期望訓練研究生具有獨立專業思考、整合技術、發掘現場課題、創出新生產手法之能力。
description.en: The planning of building system is an essential part of architectural planning. But it needs strengthen badly in our architecture study. In this course we use a systematic approach to handle the mechanism of integration in building systems, and the method of conduction, that may promote our design density and building quality. This course contents: Introduction of contemporary System Theory Divide and unify of building systems Concepts and methods of System Integration Cases and experiments of integration in building systems

name.en: An introduction to sustainable architectural research

description.zh: 本課程主要係針對全球化與國際化時代來臨後，身為地球村的一份子如何整合因對永續建築與環境不同價值觀所帶來之衝擊，並透過客觀研究與實際案例具體提出適切的解決之道，以取得永續建築與環境所存在異同之平衡。課程期望透過引導並激發研究者在面對永續建築與環境之種種議題時，能夠同時尋求人類與建築以及環境三者間共存共榮之最適當方式。學習過程中，研究者除必需提出理論與實務案例做為研究之基礎外，傳授者同時亦將由研究討論過程中了解研究者個別之特質，並依照其不同特質協助研究者建立正確的邏輯思維，以建立建築專業道德與卓越價值觀，以期確實能夠使研究者在精確掌握時代趨勢的前提下，提出符合建築專業研究對於永續建築與環境兩者異同平衡之解決策略與妥善建議，並期望藉由研究能夠更進一步獲得社會對於建築專業研究之認同，最終達到永續建築與環境平衡之目標。
description.en: This course targeting mainly after the era of globalization and internationalization, who is a member of the global village how to integration for sustainable construction and environmental impact of the different values, and through objective research and the case specifying the appropriate solutions, in order to achieve sustainable architectural and environmental similarities and differences that exist in balance. Courses through guided and inspired researchers in when confronted with various issues of sustainable architecture and environment, while seeking human and architectural and environmental coexistence and common prosperity among the three most appropriate manners. Learning process in the, researchers except required made theory and practice case do for research of based outside, taught who while also will by research discussion process in the understanding researchers individual of trait, and pursuant to its different trait assist researchers established correctly of logical

name.zh: 經典文學作品創意教學

description.zh: 本課程主旨在向各級學校的英語師資，或對西洋文學文化有興趣的社會人士，推薦英美文學經典作品作為創意教學的教材藍本，兼具創意教學此一領域的理論介紹與創作實務。學員們藉由對英美經典文學作品與其相關之多媒體文化產物的研讀和探索，激起反應、反省與靈感，進而以英文創作作為回饋，朝向創意產業邁進。本課程設計的目標在激發學員多方面的能力：（1）瞭解英美經典文學作品的文字之美與文化意涵、（2）用英語表達的習慣、（3）用英文創作的潛能、以及（4）進入英語文化創意產業的準備。
description.en: This course introduces English literary cannons as the basis for teaching creativity and the related theories and practices. Students will be exploring a series of multimedia and cultural products created based on English literary cannons and in terms creating their own works. Students of this course are expected to develop in these four aspects: 1. Understanding English literary cannons and their cultural implications; 2. Expressing oneself well in the English language; 3. Creating in the English language; 4. Equipping for the English cultural and literary creative industry.

description.zh: 本課程旨於培訓職場專業英文教學師資, 以因應在未來對專門領域及用途英語文教學師資之趨勢。在一般普通英文教師需求已近飽合的現況且對專業英文教學的新需求潮流下,建構新的專業用途英語教學內容及方法為本課程之宗旨及目標。本所應用語言組課程之主軸為以應用語言學為導向之專業英語研究及應用的人才,除培養專業英文應用能力以期研究所畢業生在業界專業領域中以優勢英語文能力為基礎,厚植專業發展潛能。而針對未來對專門領域及用途英語文教學師資之需求,以專業英文研究為基礎輔以強化ESP課程設計及課堂教學法，方能成功轉換普通英文教師角色至ESP/EPP教學。畢業生未來可於大學,政府部門,私人企業,及專門提供專業英文教學機構中,從事專業英文職前及在職英文訓練教師。
description.en: When it comes to ESL/EFL teaching and learning, traditional teaching methodology has its major emphasis on theories of teaching and learning general English.  Methods and approaches in the ESL/EFL classrooms, material implementation, course design and assessment do not meet the demands in the fast-growing market for function-specific professional English teaching personnel. While the pedagogical courses acknowledges the importance and necessity of preparing students with the ESL / EFL teaching basics, it is particularly our mission to expand the ESL /EFL horizon into a new realm of ESP/EPP-specific teaching contexts with the necessary tools, resources, and techniques in implementing ESP/ EPP courses. Quarrying out knowledge from both English pedagogy and ESP / EPP theories and applications, students are prepared to establish the tailor-developed ESP / EPP programs for specific industries and corporations for pre-career training and in-job trainings as well. From diagnostic needs analys

description.zh: 此課程旨在因應高階英語文學習者的需要，協助他們得到近乎英美人士的語言知識、瞭解真實世界溝通的詞彙使用方式。關乎創新而主流、重複出現的詞彙變化模式。近年來成長迅速的詞彙語用學，探究詞彙的流動性及其基底修辭功能，諸如意義窄化、擴充、演變、偏離、轉換等現象。
description.en: This course aims to meet the needs of advanced learners of English who are in the pursuit of near-native knowledge and understanding of English lexical use in real-world communication. Lexical pragmatics concerns itself with the creative and at the same time mainstream, re-occurring patterns of lexical variations. The recent rapidly growing area of lexical pragmatics explores lexical dynamics as well as their underpinning rhetorical functions, such as phenomena of meaning narrowing, expansion, evolution, deviation, modification, etc.

name.zh: 透過文學與電影教授文化知識
name.en: Teaching Cultural Literacy through Literature and Film

description.zh: 識字指一個人的讀寫能力。然而，文化知識指一個人對某一個文化所具備的基本知識，並且能藉此類知識與他人就該文化的內容進行交談的能力。此類知識內容包括文化知識分子所熟知的歷史、藝術、與習慣。本課程聚焦於文化根本元素之一的文學，藉由研討若干西方文學所不可或缺之基本文本、作者、及想法，探究具備西方文學與文化修養的意義為何。
description.en: Literacy refers to an individual’s basic ability to read and write. Cultural literacy, however, refers to an individual’s basic knowledge about a culture – about the history, the art, and the practices which an educated member of that culture would have knowledge of and which allow him to participate in conversations with others about the culture. Focusing on literature, one fundamental element of culture, asking what it means to be literate about Western literature, this course examines some of the basic texts, authors, and ideas in Western culture that are essential to the teaching and the study of literature.

description.zh: 本課程探討語言評量原則與方法以及相關重要課題。涵蓋之主題包括：語言評量原則；語言測驗設計；說、聽、讀、寫語言能力評量；替代、真實評量〈如學習歷程檔案評量法〉；語言評量研究法。
description.en: This course examines principles of and major approaches to language assessment and current issues in the field. The main topics include the following: principles of language assessment, designing language tests, approaches to assessing language skills (listening, speaking, reading, writing), alternative, authentic assessment (portfolios, conferences, observations, peer assessments, self assessments), and conducting research in classroom-based assessment.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

name.en: Applied Technology of the Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解物聯網 (Internet of Things)的本基概念及其所應用的各種技術。本課程包含(1)簡介(2)物聯網的基本架構及其關鍵技術，(3)物聯網感知層及其應用技術，(4)物聯網感網路層及其應用技術，(5)物聯網應用層及其應用技術，(6)無線感測網路工作原理及實習，(7)RFID工作原理及實習。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the basic concepts and applied technologies in the field of Internet of Things. The main subjects of this course include :(1) Introduction .(2)The basic structure of Internet of Things and it key technologies.(3) The device layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies. (4)The connect layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(5)The application layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(6)The principle and practice of wireless sensor network.(7) The principle and practice of RFID.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

name.en: Special Topics on Geographic Information System

description.zh: 本課程重點在訓練學生如何學習使用地理資訊系統的軟硬體設備，作為空間規劃與設計決策支援的工具。內容涵蓋相關理論及實務，範圍包括：一、	地理資訊系統的定義與發展二、	地理資訊系統的架構與功能三、地理資訊系統在空間規劃與設計上之應用四、地理資訊系統相關軟體之操作五、實務應用
description.en: The course designed is to help students to utilize the GIS environments to produce a better decision-making when dealing with space planning and design issues. Both related theories and applications of GIS are introduced.  The content of the course include:1.The definition and development of GIS2.The mainframe and functions of GIS3.The applications on space planning and design of GIS4.The introduction and operation of GIS software5. Applications practice.

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1.能源成本控制    2.區域型電力能管理策略    3.能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4.冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5.總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6.新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

Artificial neural networks (ANN) 2-1 ANN fundamentals 2-2 Applications and experiments of neural-control 3. Fuzzy logic control system  3-1 Fuzzy logic basics 3-2 Applications and experiments of fuzzy control 4. Genetic algorithms 4-1 Preliminary of GA  4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms.

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 本課程著重於中英文口頭報告能力之培養，在模擬發表過程中，培養學生使用正確的表達用法，並建立適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English languages via simulated presentations in class.  Students will learn how to present their papers precisely and how to engage a conversation properly.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: 車輛所與職車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.
