description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。本課程亦將論及禪學觀念與管理的關聯性，提供學生一個東方觀點的管理藝術，幫助學生瞭解禪在企業管理應用的基本理念與價值；將禪的卓越智慧運用於公司的治理決策。學生們將被要求從事一項對目前工商界中具企業倫理公司治理的調查分析與評論。
description.en: This course discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity). This course will also discuss the relations between Zen and management. It introduces the Eastern management art to the students helping them understand how the concept and values of Zen can assist the decision-making in corporate governance.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。本課程亦將論及禪學觀念與管理的關聯性，提供學生一個東方觀點的管理藝術，幫助學生瞭解禪在企業管理應用的基本理念與價值；將禪的卓越智慧運用於公司的治理決策。學生們將被要求從事一項對目前工商界中具企業倫理公司治理的調查分析與評論。

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1.程式語言之發展與分類，2.設計原理，3.語法與語意，4.資料型態，5.控制結構，6.正規語言，7.抽象資料型態，8.物件導向程式語言，9.函式語言，10.邏輯語言，11.平行處理語言。
description.en: 1.History and paradigm of programming languages 2.Design principles of programming languages 3.Syntex and semantics 4.Data types 5.Control structures 6. Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 1. GPS 的緣起與發展2. GPS 的系統架構3. GPS 的時間與座標4. GPS 的定位原理與觀測量5. GPS 的誤差分析6. GPS 導航定位分法7. GPS 在測量的應用GPS 導航定位實習
description.en: 1. The origin and development of GPS.2. The structure of GPS.3. GPS time and coordination.4. GPS positioning principle and measurements.5. GPS error analysis.6. GPS in navigation.7. GPS in measurement.  8.GPS practice

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個BIM相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM程式撰寫，BIM系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 1. 授課目的：  現代都市計劃及都市設計作業內容中，必須考量都市永續環境生態之議題。本課程之目的即在於傳述都市之生態概念在規劃實務上之應用，並探討其作業技術內容及其行政程序，以培養學生永續都市及敷地計畫規劃能力。2. 授課內容：  由基本永續都市中，思考生態環境、人類生活環境及建築之間的相互關係。綠建築、永續都市之內容。引介各項生態技術原理及其指標講授，進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫論文，再而論證其都計管制規範。3. 作業練習：  本學期藉由實驗操作、論文報告撰寫，特別著重研討式論辯，訓練學術思辯及技術應用規劃能力，以利學生認識都市生態技術及都計行政作業之整體關聯性，進而建立其全方位規劃思辯能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the environmental planning, green buildings and sustainable urban design. Its major content includes: 1. Study of relation between Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

description.zh: 模擬輔助設計之基礎在於如何操作數位輔助工具的模擬準確性，與了解不同設計階段所需之不同層次的模擬真實性。本課程將針對空間的尺度，進行永續與節能等物理性質，與視覺與空間感知等感官性質進行模擬輔助設計。目的即在訓練學生如何在不同的設計階段能有效利用數位工具來做正確評估，並作為設計決定的適當依據。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce computer simulation tools to evaluate various performances of different design solutions.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

notes: 永續建築國際專班與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程藉由優質學術論文內容的解析，協助研究生學習並改進學術論文寫作的技巧，經由實作增強投稿發表的能力。內容涵蓋學術論文主題的精選，研究問題的界定，文獻回顧的深入，論文結構的建立與文字的鋪陳，研究發現的討論與結論的撰寫，針對論文完成後投稿的步驟及審查意見的回覆等均以實例進行探討。
description.en: The course helps PhD students to practice and improve their writing skills for academic purposes. The key components of the course focuses on the discussion of some selected papers from high quality journal articles to absorb their writing and presenting skills. Hence, the students can have better opportunities to produce satisfied academic articles to meet the requirements for publication and degree dissertation.

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。

description.zh: 課程從統計模式(迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統軟體設計實務

description.zh: 本課程將提供系上學生兼具實務與理論之課程特色及專業實務訓練，以強化本系學生對於嵌入式系統軟硬體技術的認識與實作能力，其內容包括： （１）嵌入式系統開發環境建置 （２）嵌入式作業系統與各種自由軟體授權模式簡介 （３） UML於嵌入式軟體工程應用與CMMI標準（４）開放源碼之圖形化介面函式庫與視覺處理函示庫（５）智慧型手持行動裝置 （6）異質多核心平台之開發
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with design methodologies, tools, and implementation practices of embedded software design. Its topics include: 1. Embedded System Development Platform and Tool-chains. 2. Embedded Operating Systems and Open Source Software Engineering.  3. UML for Embedded Software Engineering and CMMI. 4. Developing Embedded Software Using Opensource GUI and Computer Vision Libraries. 5. Embedded Mobile Devices. 6. Heterogeneous Multi-core Embedded Platforms.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 請參閱英文概述。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of written description, enablement, and obviousness related to biotechnology patent filing. The materials used include court cases and patent examination guidelines. The course particularly disccuses those issues under the U.S. case law.

description.zh: 本課程內容將著重專利申請說明書的撰寫練習，以及專利爭端中如舉發、申復、答辯等文書的實作，期使選課同學於修畢此課程後，具備有上述相關專利文件的實作能力，並作為至業界實習前的先修課程。
description.en: This course, as a prerequisite course prior to the practicum course, will focus on the practice of drafting patents and the preparation of  the documents in patent dispute. Students are expected to have the abilities to prepare the relevant documents in the final.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹台灣專利實務為主，包括專利分類與檢索、專利要件、說明書與申請專利範圍之解讀與撰寫、審查意見通知與核駁審定、專利舉發、專利侵害鑑定、專利訴訟；也簡要介紹美國與中國大陸專利實務。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Taiwan-based patent practice, including:1.	patent classification and search2.	industrial application, usability, novelty, inventive step, unobviousness3.	description and claims 4.	office action and rejection5.	cancellation6.	patent infringement7.	patent litigation8.	U.S. patent practice9.	Chinese patent practice

name.zh: 國際貿易與智財專題研究

description.zh: 智慧財產是國際貿易中的重要一環，近20年來，由於知識經濟的發展與國際多邊條約的興起，國際架構下的智財法制愈形重要。各國無不苦思如何在保護主義與自由貿易之間取得平衡，此時研究國際貿易角力下的智財發展，具有相當意義。本課程即在提供學生對重要國際組織與條約下所形成的智財法制的基本了解，並由實務案例的討論中，帶領同學分析國際智財法制對國家經濟、法規面的影響。
description.en: Intellectual Property has played an important role as an integral part of the international trade, and its significance has been increasing over the past two decades contributed by the burgeoning international treaties and knowledge-driven economic models.  While individual nations struggle to achieve national prosperity by striking a balance between protectionism and free trade, the changes in intellectual property law and policy under the tussle of international trade are worth of our close attention.  This course intends to provide students with a general understanding on both the theories and practice of intellectual property legal regimes within the context of international trade. Students will learn how the frameworks of intellectual property law and policy affect the societies and economies of individual member states of international treaties. By drawing selected cases for discussion, students will further be equipped with abilities to analyze the impact of international treati

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 透過理論及實務配合講解，並輔以實例觀察，課程以能源經濟理論為講授架構，講解能源經濟之特性及型態，並介紹我國能源政策訂訂原則及內涵，以使學生能對能源產業及能源政策有整體性瞭解，讓學生得以學以應用，為以後升學、就業或進入政府部門服務奠下良好基礎。
description.en: This course is to teach the theory of energy economic and strategy. Through the lecture of theory and real case study, students can learn the characteristics and type of energy industry and the principles and contents of energy strategy. Students can understand the energy market and energy strategy for studying in the graduate school, entering companies, and servicing for the government department.

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1)管理常見之專有名詞，(2)英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3)會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4)企業計劃書的編寫，及(5)現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 本課程大量的個案來說明企業管理的理論觀念以及分析方法,讓學生對企業管理有一定程度的了解,課程內容將以國內與國外著名案例為基礎,主題包括策略管理,行銷管理,組織領導,科技管理等。課程將採用參與式個案為教學方法,個案來源為哈佛商學院以及光華管理個案資料庫。
description.en: This course uses Harvard style case method to enhance MBA students' business concepts and theories. The topics include: strategy management, marketing management, leadership, and technology management. The case materials will be adapted from Harvard Business School and KMCC center.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 行銷管理的進階課程，本課程主要目的在於： 1. 瞭解行銷理論的主要議題。 2. 瞭解行銷思想的歷史與演進。 3. 瞭解科學對行銷學的影響。 4. 幫助找尋可能的行銷論文研究主題。培養加強科學研究的能力等。
description.en: This course is designed to: 1. consider major contemporary issues in marketing theory, 2. understand the history and evolution of marketing thought, 3. understand the fundamental issues involved in the philosophy of science and its impact on marketing inquiry, 4. search for possible thesis topics or evaluate your preliminary thesis proposal, enhance the ability to conduct scientifically respectable research and to evaluate research in a professional-critical manner.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

name.zh: 美國專利訴訟專題研究
name.en: Special Topics on U.S. Patent Litigation

description.zh: 請見英文概述。
description.en: This course is a research-based course. Students will be exposed to various legal issues involving U.S. patent litigation. The procedural issues are mainly explored. Each student will be assigned with one research topic.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

name.zh: 醫療植入物與醫材測試
name.en: Implants and Their Material Testing Methods

description.zh: 本課程將針對常用之醫療植入物作一簡介, 並將常用之醫療材料,包括金屬及高分子,之特性與測試原理做說明. 課程中亦包含有簡單手術過程簡介. 此課程無指定教科書. 修課學生需在學期中作1-2次分組報告.報告內容與本課程內容相關即可.
description.en: The course is designed to familiarize students with commonly used medical implants - how they work and what they are made of. Also an introduction of implant materials testing methods, mostly metal alloys and polymers, will be laid out in the class. A few simple surgery procedures are included in the lecture. Students are expected to make 1-2 presentations with content related to this course during the semester.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 從設計產業經營之立足點探討經典服務理論如：服務品質、服務設計與服務體驗工程（S.E.E.）之應用與實踐。授課內容側重於基礎服務理論與最新服務科學方法的介紹，並選擇特定服務產業進行實務研習對象。課程預計以主題講授、專家座談、分組研習方式進行，並分三期評量服務研習成果。
description.en: The course aims at the training of applying prominent service theories and methods such as Service Quality, Service Design, Service Experience Engineering (S.E.E.) to the management of design service. It proceeds in the forms of topics lecturing, professional speeches and groups study. The result of study is evaluated in three stages accordingly.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: (1)輻射度學與光度學基本參數介紹-流明、燭光、勒克斯、尼特 (2)光的量測-總光功率量測、光強角分布、光譜量測、色溫量測、演色性量測 (3)配光曲線與照明簡單範例計算 (4)室內照明標準與照明規畫 (5)道路照明與CIE道路照明標準 (6) Dialux照明專用軟體介紹 (7) Dialux室內照明設計實例 (8) Dialux道路照明設計實例(9) Dialux體育場照明設計實例(10) Dialux景觀照明設計實例。
description.en: Outline：Module 1: Construction of a buildingModule 2: Construction of the exterior scene Module 3: More buildingsModule 4: Interior objects and texture, Import of a 3DS file Module 5: Furniture and textures in exterior scenesModule 6: Selection and positioning of luminaires in an interior sceneModule 7: Luminaire groups and light scenes in an interior sceneModule 8: Calculation, Results, VisualizationModule 9: Normative Evidence referring to the EN 12464-1Module 10: Planning report Outputs

notes: 光電四與光電所與最後一哩合開,光電所優先,限15人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

description.zh: 資料和決策課程主要在介紹資訊和資料工程學，電腦推論的應用和企業決策管理等內容的設計的決策支援系統、資料抽離、資料採礦和智慧型的使用者－系統的合作系統。並利用電腦的使用來發現資料的型態，及其他任何類型的本文、影像或數字。其目的為幫助企業經理在不確定之情況下，瞭解資料和決策分析，作出較好的決定。
description.en: Data and Decision course focuses on information and data engineering, computational reasoning applied, and enterprise decision management to the design of decision support systems, information extraction, data mining, and intelligent, adaptive user-system collaboration. It implements the use of computers to discover patterns in data, of any kind, text, images or numbers.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。科技管理是一門結合科技、商事及法律的課程。主要是希望透過資訊科技相關基礎知識，以整合組織內部資源，提升組織對於科技運籌帷幄的能力，進而達成組織最終目的。相較於傳統的MBA，科管所除了必須具備一般的管理知識外，更著重在於高科技產業方面相關專業知識的強化。
description.en: This is a course combining Technology, commerce and law. It aims to integrate the resources of the organization via information technology and raise the competitiveness. Comparing with MBA, except the courses of general knowledge management, Technology and Innovation Management put more emphasizes on the professional knowledge of hi-tech and related industries.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     創新設計之意涵，創新設計之方法，創新設計之個案研究，智慧財產權之維護。
description.en: Meaning of Creative Design, Methods of Creative Design, Case study of Creative Design,      Protection of Intellectual Properties.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計積体電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路佈局的能力,課程內容包念： 1. SOC設計介紹 2. SOC設計流程與工具 3. 以平台為基礎的SOC設計 4. 軟體應體共同設計 5. SIP設計介紹 6. 嵌入式RTOS 7. 混合模式設計 8. SOC測試與驗證 9. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of advanced FPGA system. Therefore, the student has the design capability of advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction to SOC Design 2. SOC Design Flow & Tools 3. Platforms Based SOC Design 4. Hardware/Software Co-design 5. Introduction to SIP Design 6. Embedded RTOS 7. Mixed-mode Design 8. SOC Testing & Verification 9. Case Study

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

description.zh: 1. 基礎	1.1 使用者之特性	1.2 電腦之特性	1.3 人機互動2. 設計	2.1 可用性之原理	2.2 設計程序	2.3 使用者之模式	2.4 工作分析	2.5 對話記號及設計	2.6 系統模式	2.7 實作工具及支援	2.8 評估技術	2.9 線上協助及文件3. 進階課題	3.1 群體工作軟體	3.2 CSCW 課題及理論	3.3 多重感測系統
description.en: 1. Foundations	1.1 The human	1.2 The computer	1.3 The interaction2. Design Practice	2.1 Usability paradigms and principles	2.2 The design process	2.3 Models of the user in design	2.4 Task analysis	2.5 Dialogue notations and design	2.6 Models of the system	2.7 Implementation support	2.8 Evaluation techniques	2.9 Online help and documentation3. Advanced Topics	3.1 Groupware	3.2 CSCW issues and theory	3.3 Multi-sensory systems

description.zh: 1.無線傳輸技術之效能評估2.GSM系統之分析與模擬3.IS-95 CDMA系統之分析與模擬4.第三代行動通訊系統之分析與模擬5.定位機制之探討6.統計通道模擬7.定點通道模擬
description.en: 1.Performance Evaluation of Wireless Transmission Techniques2.Analysis and Simulation of GSM System3.Analysis and Simulation of IS-95 CDMA System4.Analysis and Simulation of 3G Systems5.Positioning6.Statistic Channel Modeling 7.Sight Specific Channel modeling

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

notes: 乙/8選2, 製科所、機電所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 開課：機電、製科所合開（上學期）(含一般生、在職生)本課程說明RFID系統架構，技術、編碼、和應用標準，資訊系統，效益評估，隱私權問題，及各領域或產業的創新應用和案例。
description.en: This course is to explain the RFID system structure, the standard of technology, object coding and applications, IT solution systems, ROI considerations, privacy issues, and then the innovative applications in different field or industry.

name.zh: 專業英文課程設計與評量
name.en: English curriculum design and evaluation in professional fie

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生職場英語課程設計及評量的理論基礎，並懂得應用理論基礎到實際的職場英語文課程發展。本課程主要探討主題為課程設計的概念、模式及其程序，及應用課程設計的理論於職場英語文課程的發展及評量。
description.en: This course aims at exploring knowledge bases of the English curriculum design and evaluation and putting curricular theories into practice in curriculum planning for professional development English courses. Emphases of the course will be on major issues, theoretical bases and procedures of the English curriculum planning, especially the English course design for professional fields and evaluation of the effectiveness of the designed courses.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

name.en: Syntax: Theory and Application in English Teaching

description.zh: 本課程的目的是複習英語的句子結構，以獲得對語法形式更深層的瞭解，包含各種描述性或理論性的分析方法。藉著採用不同英語教學方法，這種瞭解與知識有助於解答在英語教學上所遭遇的各種學習歷程的問題，尤其是寫作和翻譯的學習過程中。
description.en: This course reviews the sentence structures in English for a deeper understanding of grammatical constructions, including various descriptive and theoretical approaches to representing them. By applying various English teaching methods, such knowledge can be helpful in dealing with problems that are frequently encountered when carrying out various learning activities in the classroom, especially essay writing and translation activities.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    奈米顆粒材料種類與應用，磁性流體、奈米熱傳流體及奈米晶種等，製造方法與設備，真空技  術與奈米顆粒製造，電弧製程控制技術，奈米顆粒操控，篩選過濾，奈米材料之安全性。
description.en: Magnetohydrodyamics,Nanofluid and Seeds, Manufacturing Methods, Arc Nanoparticle   Synthesis System, Vacuum system for Arc Synthesis System, Synthesis and Applications of  Nanoparticles, Nano-structured Thin Films and Seeds, Synthesis and Applications of  Seeds,  Hardware and Machines, Manufacturing processes control, Nanoparticles control and filterations  as well as the safeties of the Nanoparticles

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     創新設計之意涵，創新設計之方法，創新設計之個案研究，智慧財產權之維護。
description.en: Meaning of Creative Design, Methods of Creative Design, Case study of Creative Design,      Protection of Intellectual Properties.

description.zh: 深入探討最新的IC製程技術，包含前段的加熱、離子植入、物理沈積、化學沈積、微影、蝕刻等製程，及後段的各種封裝技術及測試方法，並介紹其研究方向、製程與元件物理的關係及製程整合的技術。
description.en: Study the state of the art of the IC fabrication processes, including heating, ion implant, PVD, CVD, lithograph, etching of the front-end processes and packaging and testing of back-end processes. The trends of the processes, the relationship of the processes with the physics of the devices and the process integrating technology will also be taught in this course.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 本堂課邀請元大寶來期貨、證券及財富管理各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財報分析選股、期權商品策略介紹及交易實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en: This class is going to invite investment experts from Yuanta Futures and Yuanta Securities to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

The course contents include instrumentation for predictive diagnosis, maintenance, and monitoring; characteristics of the instrumentation; data acquisition and signal analysis; feature selection for decision making; intelligent techniques for predictive diagnosis, maintenance, and monitoring.

Hope that through the course designed to help students to summarize and organize what they have learned from school in order to enhance their ability of employment preparation.

description.zh: 設計之本質在建構新經驗，創造即做出新經驗，新經驗是未知，未知的求解即「解題」，經由主體的解題思考模式推演而得。對於主體而言經驗是相對的，經驗無法直接傳遞，必須經主體與客體間之交互建構，內化後才能成為主體之經驗。空間結構為一意義表達之外顯形式，創作者藉由此表層結構傳達其新經驗。此新經驗必須建構於創作者意識內於先，是為深層結構，再依此深層之意義形諸於外。因此創作者應是在從事一系列的行為，包括建構一意義之深層結構至轉化成一傳達意義之表層結構。 誘導式結構為一主體的「解題」思考模式；從已知成份著手分析歸納，以推論那尚未知悉的成份，終而掌握所欲追求之「解」。這種認知是在主體內經由誘導式結構.操作模型之引導，自「不知」轉為「知」，使主體在已知與未知之間搭建其誘導式結構。本理論授課分為：課程一，「誘導式結構理論」課程二，「誘導式結構理論應用」
description.en: HS is a thinking model for problem solving, an analysis of the 'known' in order to master the 'unknown' to solve the problem.  The subjective party's cognition is guided by the HS manipulating model, the transfer from 'unknown' to 'known', lets the subjective party construct a heuristic structure in between known and unknown.  The HS theory instruction consists of two courses 1,"The Heuristic Structure Theory"2,"The Application of The Heuristic Structure Theory"

description.zh: 本課程是科技專利取得與攻防的進階課程，目的是以創新思維及案例討論方式，幫助學生熟悉創新管理相關能力。商品化是將構想、創意、創新及新發現轉化成為有市場價值的產品或服務，而為企業增加競爭力的過程，本系學生擁有從事研發與創業者最需要的專利知識。許多創意點子如果有本專題課程系統化收集，它就成為校園創新的主要來源，而透過校園創新的多元面向，如技術創新，專利取得，資訊情報收集等，均可為學生能力帶來附加價值，提升競爭力。本課程將會輔導學生將其創新發想取得專利，並輔導其加入國科會或教育部主辦的創新創業比賽，或未來發展創業的可能。

Commercialization is a process that translates the ideas, creativity, innovation and new findings into a marketable product or service. It increases the competitiveness of the campus and engaged in R & D and entrepreneurs are most in need of knowledge. There are many good ideas happened, if we have data base to collect all the innovation, It will to be value material in enterprise innovation. Through product innovation, process innovation and marketing innovation, It will bring high value to students and rises its competing ability. description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在於讓學生瞭解國際企業的主要研究領域與研究方向，故本課程首先會向同學介紹國際企業研究領域中的主流思維，讓同學瞭解國際企業的性質、型態、發展趨勢與行為模式等。此外，本課程的主要目的，是希望同學能學習到如何將國際企業理論研究的主流思維，結合運用至自己的研究當中。希望博士生於修習本課程後，能夠對於國際企業的領域有更入的瞭解，並能培養出獨立研究的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce students to key areas of research in International Business studies. This course will review the current major theoretical thoughts on the scholar studies of international business, focusing on the nature, patterns, trends, and behavior of transnational corporations.The main objective of this course is then to provide students with an understanding of main currents of thoughts in this area and the abilities in incorporating these thoughts for research in a coherent way. This exercise will aid Ph.D. students in learning about theories of mutinational enterprises, and getting a feel for independent research in IB fields.

In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

name.en: Advanced Application of Sensor and Transducer Mechatronic

description.zh: 感測器及傳感器之設計與製造、訊號處理迴路設計、感測器內部電路之逆向工程、感測器與與機械設計、感測器之應用與匹配
description.en: Principle of Sensors and Transducers，Design of sensing element , Signal Conditioning Circuit Design，Mechanical Design and Packaging of sensor， Fabrication of sensor，Selection and Application of the sensors.。

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.基本介紹及概念2.高等電磁理論3.有效求解方法4.平面波方程5.園柱波方程
description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts2.Advance Theorems3.Useful Techniques4.Plane Wave Function5.Cylindrical Wave Function

name.zh: 三維多媒體電子系統應用專題

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養三維多媒體電子系統設計能力，包括三維立體影像與視訊系統。我們將以上課及實作的方式讓同學們習得三維多媒體系統的相關背景知識和設計能力，並且透過專題的實作，實現三維多媒體系統。預計在這門課之中，學生們將能以做中學的方式，學到最新的三維多媒體電子系統技術。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in 3D multimedia system design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction. 2. 3D Multimedia System. 3. 3D Multimedia Capture. 4. 3D Display. 5. 3D Multimedia Coding. 6. Project.

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

description.zh: 在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

description.zh: 介紹智慧聯網及新世代網路在固定綜合網路、行動通信網路、網際網路及有線電視網路之現況與未來發展
description.en: To introduce internet of things and the system of next generation network over fixed 、mobile 、internet and cable network。

description.zh: 本課程將介紹最佳化方法在電子、電機、微波工程的應用，其段落安排可分為三部份。第一部份是最佳化方法的基礎知識，包含了如何將問題建立成數學模型，還有講解問題複雜度、問題分類等背景知識。第二部份是遺傳演算法（evolutionary algorithms）的理論與操作，教學內容包含了基因演算法、粒子群演算法、模擬退火法、進階基因演算法等方式，除了講解它們的流程，也會列舉它們在電子與微波領域的成效。第三部份是實驗設計與分析（design and analysis of experiments），透過統計學的「佈點」與「顯著性檢定」，使用者將能以最短之時間掌握問題的反應曲面（response surface），並進而預測出最佳設計。此課程除了能幫助同學閱讀文獻，也能協助同學增進研究品質與效率。
description.en: This course consists of three parts. The first one is about the background of optimization algorithms, such as problem formulation, problem complexity, and no free lunch theorems for optimization. The second part is evolutionary algorithms, including the simple genetic algorithm, particle swarm optimization, simulation annealing, and advanced genetic algorithms. The third part is design and analysis of experiments. By using fractional factorial designs, optimization can be done in a very efficient way.

name.zh: 資訊技術在醫學工程之應用
name.en: Applies Information Technologies to Medical Engineering

description.zh: 1.醫療資訊標準 2.醫療儀器設計 3.遠距醫療系統 4.遠距照護系統 5.數位訊號處理在醫工之應用 6.PACS的設計與規則 7.輔助設計
description.en: 1.Medical Informations Standards 2.Medical Instrument Design 3.Telemedicine System 4.Telecare System 5.Digital Image Processing in Medical Engineering 6.Design & Plan of Picture Achieving and Communications System 7.Help System Design for Disable

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

name.zh: 工業攝影機設計應用與量測
name.en: Design, Applications, and Measurement of Industry Cameras

description.zh: 本課程係屬工業攝影機設計核心課程之一。本課程主要討論工業攝影機設計核心部分包含類比前端(AFE，Analog Front End)模組、FPGA影像系統處理(ISP, Image System Process)模組”設計與工業攝影機高速介面設計。本課程已“高解析度攝影機之應用於立體模型成像系統”與“應用於PCB 檢測之可適性工業攝影機設計”當整合範例。最後，使用標準測試程式來評估其“影像品質量測與評估”。本課程目標之一是增強工業攝影機設計之本質上之差異性的研發能力與國際競爭力，更進一步，超越現有產品技術之層次。課程內容可包括下列主題：(1)高解析度攝影機導論與規格(2)工業攝影機導論與規格(3)類比前端模組設計:規格參考設計、高解析度感測器、類比-數位轉換器、時序控制電路(4)影像模組設計: 規格參考設計、自動曝光、自動白平衡、色彩濾波器陣列內插、色彩校正、濾波器、伽瑪校正、動態範圍校正。(5)工業攝影機高速介面設計(6)高解析度攝影機之應用於立體模型成像系統(7)應用於PCB 檢測之可適性工業攝影機設計(8)影像品質量測與評估
description.en: This course is concerned with the design, applications, and measurement of h industry cameras, which includes the basic various characteristics of image sensors, analog and digital processes, and some applications of industry cameras. Its purpose is to deal with the design, applications, and measurement of industry cameras, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics.(1)Introduction and specifications of high-resolution cameras(2)Introduction and specifications of industry cameras(3)Design of Analog Front End (AFE) processing: Specification design, High-resolution sensor, Analogy-Digital Converter (ADC), and Timing control circuit.(4)Image module design: Specification design, Auto Exposure, Auto White Balance, Color Filter Array Interpolation, Color Correction Matrix, Filter, Dynamic Range Correction. (5)High-speed interface design of industry cameras(6)Design of industry cameras applie

name.zh: 國際觀培養-國際企業經營實務
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Business Strategies and Leadership of Global Enterprises

description.zh: 本課程藉由臺灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營管理、領導決策、整合行銷、外銷推廣等實務經驗之機會，並佐以臺灣企業品牌之實際案例，讓臺灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 上課時間ABC，共6週，最後一哩經管三經管所合開

description.zh: 這門課程的目的在於訓練學生對於資訊系統之規劃與開發的能力與實作經驗，以解決土木或研究相關問題的能力。課程內容包括C/C++、Java、FORTRAN、MATLAB等不同語言環境之子程式開發與跨語言整合，Windows與Linux分散式運算伺服器基礎環境建立，行動裝置應用程式開發，實驗儀器控制程式化，與資訊系統英文技術文件與使用文件撰寫。上述課程內容均以土木工程實際案例作為教材案例。
description.en: The purpose of this graduate level course is to improve the ability and implementation experiences on information system planning and development in civil engineering. This includes the development and integration among different programming languages such as C/C++, Java, FORTRAN, and MATLAB, installation of distributed computing infrastructures based on Windows and Linux operating systems, mobile device application development, programmable experimental facility controlling, and information system documentation on technical manuals and user's manuals. All contents in this course are accompanied with practical civil engineering cases.

description.zh: 本課程透過課堂演講，以講授最新管理知識或各產業之最新熱門管理議題，並透過學生分組研討使學生進一步瞭解經營管理的最新發展與趨勢。
description.en: This course focuses on lecturing, seminar, group study, and training of students' broad vision about the newly development and future trend of business management.

description.zh: 本課程強調具知識內涵的設計過程，以知識的探討與研究為手段，豐富設計創意的發展。透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。本課程藉由設計主題或產學合作進行實際演練，應用新科技與新材料的發展，並探討生活型態與市場的需求，研發創新型態的產品或服務。其中應用的方法包括：問題分析，需求研究，方案評估，設計檢核，價值呈現及績效評價。
description.en: This course provides an approach to Knowledge Embedded Design.‘Creating’ is the ultimate stage for learning, critical thinking and combining all acquired knowledge to produce something new and unique. Advanced Product Design (III) educates students to identify and resolve design problems – innovatively. In order to identify, expand and test user’s requirement, research and design process will be carried out under the instruction, which includes Identify the Problem, Investigation Research, Identify Possible Solution, Choose Best Solution & Develop Detail, Implement Solution, and finally, Test & Evaluation.

description.zh: 引導學生觀察及掌握不同產業的技術與市場發展趨勢，培養學生對於產業技術及市場之前瞻思考能力，協助學生整合產業趨勢及市場前瞻相關領域的專業知識，有助於學生儘早熟悉產業生態，提高其就業競爭力。
description.en: To guide students in observing and handling the different industry and market trends, training students for industry technology and foresights, to helps students consolidate expertise in areas related to industry trends and market perspectives. This course will help students as early as possible familiar with the industry, to improve their employability.

name.zh: 就業達人講座:職場必勝的法則
name.en: Lecture: The rules for success in the workplace

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「就業達人講座-職場必勝的法則」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試應對技巧、魅力溝通表達、職場自我行銷、職場生涯規劃以及職場時間管理、壓力管理等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

notes: 上課時間ABC節，為期6週。最後一哩.大學部與研究所合

name.zh: 創業講座-創業楷模˙經驗傳承
name.en: Entrepreneurship lectures- role  modles and their experiences pass on

description.zh: 邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 上課時間ABC,四管二經管所最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程將給學生從較廣義的風險管理範疇對風險值有一番認識與瞭解，主要包含以下三個部份：第一部份介紹風險值，將從近來風險管理的理論與實務發展討論其起源與基本觀念；第二部份說明衡量風險值的方法，包括變異數共變數法、歷史模擬、蒙地卡羅模擬及壓力測試；第三部份從風險值的觀點說明風險管理的相關議題，包括1) 決策法則，例如投資與避險法則。2) 信用風險。3)流動性、作業及法律風險。4)資本配置。5)企業風險管理。
description.en: This course gives students an overview of VaR, viewed in its broader risk management context. Totally, there will be three parts in this course. Part One is an introduction, which discusses the origins and basics of VaR in the context of recent developments in the theory and practice of risk management. Part Two deals with the approaches of measuring VaR, including variance-covariance approach, historical simulation, Mote Carlo simulation and stress testing. Part Three then deals with risk management issues from a VaR perspective, including 1) decision-making rules, such as investment and hedging rules; 2) credit risks; 3) liquidity, operational and legal risks; 4) capital allocation; 5) firm-wide risk management.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生了解整合行銷傳播整體概念，強調行銷傳播工像是廣告、公關、事件活動行銷等等的重要性及運用性，輔以實務個案架構；經由整合行銷個案實例，將整合行銷傳播運用詳加介紹。課堂中經由個案架構互動討論，達成理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with knowledge and understanding of the concept of integrated marketing communications and how it can be made to work effectively within an organization. A clear understanding of the principles and practice will develop student ability to analyze the marketing environment and specific marketing problems, create solutions to integrated marketing problems and apply appropriate marketing techniques across a range of market sectors.

description.zh: 本課程以1950年代以後的西方文學為本，以當代文化批評理論作為分析基礎，如互文性、族群研究、（後）殖民主義、魔幻寫實主義、女性主義、傷痕記憶等。課程討論重點概念將包括論述、再現、心理分析、後結構主義、後現代主義等。
description.en: This course is designed to initiate students to the vast field of contemporary literature after the 1950s.  Important works originally written in English (with a few translated into English from European languages) are introduced and arranged roughly in chronological order and also in terms of literary critical concepts such as intertexuality, from late modernism to the postmodernism proper, ethnic studies and (post) colonialism, magic realism, feminism, and trauma.  It is believed that literary works are cultural texts in general; hence they are best approached by cultural theories. Students will be exposed, therefore, to concepts and issues within the field such as discourse, representation, psychoanalysis, poststructuralism, and deconstructionism.

description.zh: 本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：1.	建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。2.	學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。3.	以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。4.	以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students (1) sharpen up their learning skills in English language/culture acquisition, (2) prepare a personal dossier (including autobiography, resume, CV and application letters) in English for their future career needs, (3) build up their communication skills through classroom activities, such as singing, reciting passages, short plays, small talks, and speeches.

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: Design Thinking是一個創意與設計的方法，根據各種設計主題之特性尋求解決方案，創造更多的可能性。本課程為輔導學生在建築設計操作過程的不同階段，以適切且具創造力的表現媒材與技法呈現階段性的成果，從空間觀察與記錄、問題分析、概念發想、方案演化，直至具體方案的模擬與傳達性的說明。
description.en: DESIGN THINKING looks at principles of design and ways of thinking leading to ideas and creative solutions. The course focuses on the fields of architectural design, representation processes and visual techniques applied to architecture. Through experiential learning and exploring, students are expected to be capable of utilizing both traditional and new media in different stages of design process.

notes: 設計學院大四與研究所最後一哩合開課程

name.zh: 設計思考：空間創新實踐

description.zh: Design Thinking是一個創意與設計的方法，根據各種設計主題之特性尋求解決方案，創造更多的可能性。本課程透過專業知識、創新技術與實作能力的整合，輔導學生在建築設計操作過程中培養空間落實與具體方案執行之能力，養成具備創意競賽實力與實務接軌能力的設計師。
description.en: DESIGN THINKING looks at principles of design and ways of thinking leading to ideas and creative solutions. The course focuses on the fields of architectural design process and its integration with practice techniques. Through providing specialized training and knowledge about architectural practice, students are expected to acquire professional skills and creative thinking for the career.

notes: 設計學院大四與研究所最後一哩合開課程

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋:固態反應、熱力學、熱力學研究方法、電化學方法、複相平衡方法、熱化學方法、機制調查方法、擴散回火方法、金屬氧化物間反應動力學、材料檢測技術及其基礎動力學、熱分析(技術、原理及應用，解讀TG及DTA曲線，熱示差掃描量熱及熱差分析，熱微粒分析，熱機械分析，熱膨脹分析，逸散氣體分析)，以及運用XRD與SEM方式研究固態反應。
description.en: This course covers:  Solid state reactions; thermodynamics; methods of thermodynamics investigation; electrochemical methods. heterogeneous equilibrium method; thermochemical methods; methods of investigation of mechanisms; diffusion annealing method; kinetics of reactions between metal oxides; fundamentals of kinetics as well as techniques for material characterization: thermal analysis (theory and applications, techniques, interpretation of TG and DTA curves, differential thermal analysis and scanning calorimetry, thermooptics, thermomechanics, thermodilametry, evolved gas analysis) and investigation of solid state reactions using XRD and SEM methods.

notes: Habil. Aivaras Kareiva授課，時間另行公告

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋能源開發及儲存過程中之有機、無機及觸媒材料之介紹以及材料檢測光譜技術。授課重點介紹各項材料檢測技術包含BET，紅外線光譜，拉曼光譜和阻抗。從分子觀點至巨觀角度探討天然氣轉化液體燃料，燃料電池，太陽能電池，發光二極管，能源儲存及CO2捕獲程序。
description.en: This course covers organic, inorganic and catalytic materials for energy generation and storage processes as well as spectroscopic techniques for material characterization.   Topics for characterization includes BET, infrared, Raman, and Impedance.  Gas to liquid fuel, fuel cell, solar cell, light-emitting diodes, energy storage, and CO2 capture processes will be discussed from molecular mechanistic level to the macroscopic device level.

notes: 莊顯成老師授課，時間另行公告

name.en: Smart interaction interface of living space

description.zh: 互動科技與遍佈運算技術促使建築空間成為整合媒體資訊中介界面。課程目標在利用數位資訊科技以設計使用者為中心、服務導向，敏感、回應與協調的居住環境，促使學習者多重思考未來居住空間之規劃設計可能性，與掌握相關技術。教學除專業課程，與產、官、學研究性、實務利用性的專業講題、個案研討，並輔以報告作品小組討論為評量方式。
description.en: Interaction technology and ubiquitous computing reform architectural space to an integrated media-information interface. The course objectives are to promote students to think planning of the future living space, and designing of a user-centered, service-oriented, sensitive, reflective, coordinated environment by digital interaction technology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students’ reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述財務管理中最重要的投資決策、融資決策與短期資金管理決策之基本架構及企業經理人之財務決策，並配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，內容涵蓋：金融市場與金融機構、財務報表與現金流量分析、財務規劃與預測、風險與報酬、債券與股票之評價、資金成本、資本預算決策、資本結構與財務槓桿、營運資金管理、股利政策、合併與收購…等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，以及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
description.en: The course focus on the three most important decisions of the financial management: the investment decisions, the financing decisions and short-term capital management and financial decisions of corporate managers, and various related topics with case studies, content covers: Financial markets and financial institutions, the financial statements and cash flow analysis, financial planning and forecasting, risk and return, bond and stock pricing, the cost of capital, capital budgeting decisions, capital structure and financial leverage, working capital management, dividend policy, mergers and acquisitions, etc. This course combines business management practices and financial strategies into the discussion, in order to foster both theory and practice of financial management personnel. Through the course of the attendance, students should be able to have the financial management of the academic ability to integrate knowledge and expertise, the ability of independent research, critical thin

name.zh: 設計思考：創意與創新策略

description.zh: 本課程提供學生一個與實務界交流的平台，協助學生體驗創意設計與創新策略的最佳實務。課程內容包括設計思考、創新品牌、設計觀察與創新流程等專題講座，和創意設計組織與設計公司等實地參觀見習。
description.en: This course is to provide with a platform on which students can experience the best practice of creative & innovation. The contents include of design thinking, Brand in innovation, observation and innovation process, as well as study tours of creative design organizations, and design agents.

notes: 設計學院大三大四與研究所最後一哩合開課程

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.電磁波在介質中的傳導 2.光纖光學 3.光纖種類及特性 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.光纖通訊系統 8.光纖網路
description.en: 1.Electromagnetic ware propagation in media 2.Fiber optics 3.Characteristics of optic fibers 4.Optical emitter 5. Optical receiver 6.Repeater and optical amplifier 7.Optical fiber communication 8.Optical fiber network

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 學生有機會學習當前投資議題，包括全球財富報告、風險與報酬、資產訂價、投資組合、投資人行為、次貸信用危機、蔓延效應、股價同漲同跌現象、股票推薦之利益衝突、政治、與社會責任投資議題等。本課程可培養學生在投資方面的基本知識並擴展他們未來研究的視野。
description.en: The students would have the chance to study modern investment issues, including world wealth report, risk and return, asset pricing, investment portfolio, investor behaviors, subprime credit crisis, contagion effect, stock price synchronicity, the conflicts of interest in stock recommendations, politics, and socially responsible investments. This course will not only enrich the students’ basic knowledge in investment but also broaden their vision for the future research.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒(10-12)之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類，尤其著重在光纖短脈衝雷產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝寬度與相位量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的各種應用包括光譜量測、泵-探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.
